'''''When Autumn and Dew Meet''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to let the Electro Regisvine perform its charged electrical collision.

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement comes from the poem ''Immortal at the Magpie Bridge'' {{Lang|zh=鹊桥仙|zh_rm=Què Qiáo Xiān}} by the poet {{w|Qin Guan}} {{Lang|zh=秦观}}, which is about the story of {{w|The Cowherd and the Weaver Girl| the Cowherd and the Weaver Girl}}.
